div.p: I don’t really want to take on anyone as an employer but I do want to have someone who can work alongside me in the salon,
you know to work with me but I’m also hoping to combine the two so I work for admin for the support team and during my time
there obviously I’ve realised that there’s a lot of young people out there that don’t get, you know, a lot of support so to combine the two
so I could do like recently I’ve done a girls’ group where we’ve worked on personal presentation so we’ve done like skincare,
you know the basics of how to look after yourself like to go for an interview or something and it went really well,
they loved it, it was something for them to do in the summer holidays and because it’s something that they were interested in
they really made an effort and I think it’s nice, it’s something nice but they are learning something as well so I would like to combine
the two and do like therapy, like beauty therapy with maybe disadvantaged young people that haven’t, or won’t have,
the opportunity to do it, you know they won’t have the chances to do anything like that.
